name.ja: <ruby>深淵の獣<rt>ビーステッド</rt></ruby>バルドレイク

text.en: You can target 1 LIGHT or DARK monster in either GY; banish it, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand. This is a Quick Effect if your opponent controls a monster. If your opponent Special Summons a Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and/or Link Monster(s): You can Tribute 1 other LIGHT or DARK monster, then target 1 of those Summoned monsters; banish it. You can only use each effect of "Bystial Baldrake" once per turn.
